about_the_game:
An adventure autobattler game based on customizable dice rolls and rogue-lite elements, inspired by real events in 16th century Brazil. Build your own dice, strategically choosing each face, and defend the region of Pindó from the Whitecloak invaders!



  • Unique battle mechanics: Engage in real-time automatic combat based on customizable dice rolls and use active skills, providing a harmonious experience of strategy, luck, and action.
  • Forge the perfect die: Customize each face of your die with unique abilities and see them in action as they are rolled! Strategic die-building is essential to overcome each challenge.



  • Character customization: Create different builds through talents, collectible artifacts, equipment, and battle drums - powerful abilities that can be activated by the player, resulting in significant effects!
  • Rogue-lite elements: Explore randomly generated maps and encounter a variety of enemies, events, and surprises in each playthrough. Game knowledge and the ability to adapt to circumstances are essential for success.





  • Indigenous fantasy: Immersed in 16th century Brazil and its diverse indigenous cultures, the world of YVY offers a unique layer of fantasy, providing an authentic and engaging experience.
  • Thematic events: Encounter a variety of events with risks and rewards that enrich both the gameplay and the thematic universe of the game, offering unique challenges and enticing rewards.
  • Engaging storyline: Explore the struggle of indigenous peoples against colonial invaders, highlighting a perspective rarely seen, and introducing customs, experiences, and characters of the Mão da Terra people, providing an exciting and immersive narrative.
